description: This file sets up an Express.js application by configuring middleware and routing for a bookstore backend, including routes for catalog, cart, and checkout.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Function to include external modules or files.

methods.name: express
methods.description: Imports the Express.js framework to create the web server.

methods.name: express.json
methods.description: Middleware to parse incoming JSON requests.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Mounts middleware or route handlers at specified path.

methods.name: module.exports
methods.description: Exports the configured Express app for use by other modules.
